transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, good evening sir. Main baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Sagar Chakravarti se baat kar rahe hain kya?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Yes, aapne abhi IndiaMART ke customer care pe call kiya hai, nice friend. Mujhe batayiye sir kya concern hai aapka?
Customer: Oh, mera jo koi lead nahi show kar raha hai.
Executive: Koi bhi by lead show nahi kar raha hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Thik hai sir, ek baar main check karti hu. Aapne jo login kiya hai wo dusre number se kiya hai ya apne hi primary number se kiya hai? Main ek baar check kar leti hu screen mein aap line pe rahiye.

Executive: Sir by lead hi nahi show kar raha hai. Ek baar aap apna profile dekhoge kabhi aap desktop pe laptop pe phone pe?
Customer: Phone pe.
Executive: Phone pe ho na? Thik hai. To phone pe by lead aapko waha pe dikh raha hoga. Hi Sagar karke option dikh raha hai? Sir dikh raha hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hi Sagar three line show kar raha hai kya?
Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hi Sagar three line show kar raha hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai. Ab aap by lead page pe aaiye. Latest by lead pe aaiye.

Customer: Search by lead?
Executive: Hello. Aaiye sir. Haan ji. Search by lead. Search by lead. Latest by lead pe aaiye. Sir by lead pe jab mention karte ho na. Haan ji.
Customer: Haan aa gaya.
Executive: Latest by lead pe aaiye. Recent. Could not find any relevant by leads for you. I will update you sir. Aap recent by lead pe aaye ho waha pe ek option hoga relevant and recent. To recent upar filter lagao aur location ka filter India lagao.

Executive: Dikha sir?
Customer: West Bengal.
Executive: Recent aur India ka filter laga pa rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan. Kaha West Bengal likha hua hai.
Executive: Sir latest by lead mein agar aayenge aap by lead page pe aa gaye waha pe relevant aur recent option hai yes. Haan. Recent pe click kijiye.
Customer: Recent pe click kiya hai.
Executive: Haan ji. Usi ke niche location option hai location mein India ka filter lagaiye.
Customer: India.
Executive: Ab aapko by lead dikh rahi hai?
Customer: Ye to sare India ka dikha raha hai. India mein nahi hai. Mera jo West Bengal aur Kolkata ka liye hai.
Executive: Aapko kaha ka by lead chahiye sir?
Customer: Kolkata, West Bengal.
Executive: Aap location mein West Bengal ka filter lagao.

Customer: Bengal mein ek hi show kar raha hai.
Executive: Haan, to actually Kolkata se na ek bhi single by lead post nahi hua hai. West Bengal West Bengal se hamare paas mein bhi aaj din ke pehle ek by lead show hua hai Darjeeling se. Thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan ji. Agar system aapko by lead show nahi kar raha hai aapke near by aapki location ka ya aapke state ka near by state ka it means hota hai ki us location se abhi requirement post nahi hua hai. But doesn't matter ki wo har din post nahi hoga. To iske ek solution ye hai ki aap every day pehle apni location fir West Bengal ye do filters lagaiye apna agar agar koi problem nahi hai to.
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho? Agar kuch problem nahi hai to.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir waisa koi issue nahi hai isliye na sir local ka by lead post jyada nahi karta buyer aapko soche na kyuki offline aap baithe ho aapke alawa char aur log bhi baithe honge to agar aap apne near by customer ki requirement offline hi fulfill kar doge to unhe online aane ki jarurat hi nahi hai sir. Hai na?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Yes.
Executive: Thik hai. Is wajah se waha pe requirement hai nahi. Baki aisa koi hamari side se issue nahi hai aur main baki ka discussion na ek baar jo aapke account manager hai na Harsh unka number main aapko bata rahi hu wo save kar lo koi bhi concern ho aap unko connect kar sakte ho baki main ek baar bol dungi ki kal aapse bhi discuss kar le aapke aur product related details. Hai na? To mujhe ek baar aap number note kar lijiye main number bata rahi hu.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Just a second. Number is 83 6879. Ek minute. Haan ji. 83 6879 Hmm. 3095.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai ye aapke account manager hai inko aap connect kar lijiyega baki main unko bol bhi deti hu. Dusri cheez sir abhi aapne IndiaMART ke na IndiaMART ke customer care pe call kar diya hai 9696 mein to hamare paas concern raise ho gaya hai jo cheez aap bol rahe ho to main isko close kar du sir aapki permission ke through kyuki discussion ho gayi hai is cheez ko leke main aapko bata diya hai baki aur detail discussion ke liye ek baar main account manager se kal connect karwa deti hu jaisa aap sahi bole. Thik hai.
Executive: Fir closer mein dalungi ya request ki aap please positive response de dijiye mail pe taki main isko close kar paun thik hai sir. Thik hai thik hai thik hai. Haan ji okay aur baki sir koi aur dikkat aur aapko aur koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi hai calls inquiries aa rahi hai barabar. Thik hai. Nahi nahi thik hai. Thik hai sir okay thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to see buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive provided troubleshooting steps to find buyleads.

- Shared account manager's number for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the raised concern.

- Account manager will connect with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, filters, location
